import React, { useState } from 'react' import {useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import "./css/login.css" const initiaState = { email: "", password: "" } function Login() { const [formdata, setFormData] = useState(initiaState) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() navigate('/register') } const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({...formdata, [e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } return (
